title: Ticket #6909: scitokens: Do not force credential to be named "scitokens.top"
description:
Currently, if CREDD_OAUTH_MODE = TRUE and a SEC_CREDENTIAL_PRODUCER is utilized, then the credential request file is named $SEC_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY/$USERNAME/scitokens.top. See:

https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/blob/2c1e52c88070fca32311394c5093e81a4bc6f3ae/src/condor_utils/store_cred.cpp#L89

This is not a particularly flexible setup: the provider name should be configurable (and, ideally, the admin should be able to setup multiple providers to be done at condor_submit time.
creator: bbockelm
